segment.target: To maintain optimal efficiency, alternate working with a crewmate.
Every fire has a 25% chance of burning itself out every cycle.
After several hours of negotiation with NERON, you can convince it to also use the anti-cigarette device for fires.
Generates 5 pieces of scrap metal in the Engine Room.
By dismantling all of Raluca's failed PILGRED experiments, you are able to recover a stack of used metal which can then be used to patch up the hull or repair patrol ships!
Blocked doors are reported on your PDA.
By analyzing the smoke coming from defective pistons in the automatic doors, NERON can now determine precisely which doors are affected and relay the information to your PDA.
Equipment that has been interfered with is reported on your PDA.
Nothing beats a little NERON defragmentation. Filled with happiness it is more than content to pass a little extra info along to your PDA.
Fires are reported on your PDA.
After spending several hours convincing NERON that fire could be detrimental to its own well-being, it gave in and allocates more CPU power to the task... it still seems pretty annoyed though.
In the garden, each mature plant has a 50% chance of growing an additional fruit.
Equipped with "spring softness" lightbulbs, these lamps work miracles on extraterrestrial plants. They perfectly imitate the rays from our good old Sun.
Growth duration of young plants in the garden will be reduced by 4.
Steam-fueled nano-ladybugs. Why on earth did nobody think of this before!
Repairing PILGRED gives you access to new space routes, including the route to Earth.
The hull of the Daedalus is now protected by an automatically regenerating shield.
You never had the time to complete it, but this damned plasma shield would have been really handy. By downloading a new core and restarting the particle tabulatrix driver, it should work just fine.
The number of assailants joining you after a trip is reduced to 25% (down from 50%).
We can't cloak the Daedalus but by adding a flame shield on the lateral jets, we can make it more difficult to follow.
Searching for a planet costs 1 :pa: less.
NERON is a little bit OCD when it comes to scalability optimization, but this time it's done a half-assed job, you simply unhook the bool Array DB to bit Arrays. What a halfwit you are, NERON...
Adds another three pots in the garden for plant-growing purposes.
NERON found the hydroponic plant pot blueprints; Retrieving materials from the incubator should make it possible to create three additional pots.
NERON's core can now be accessed from the medlab as well as from the engine room.
It would be practical to be able to get here without having to walk so far... by re-routing a 100V electric razor socket, you make an SCSS bridge to NERON.
If you are not Mush, each shower has a 25% chance of giving you + 1:hp: OR +1:pmo: OR + 2:pm:.
Suffering from arthritis? Lumbago making your life a misery? SNC can help.
Every cycle, the Daedalus has a 15% chance of not falling apart...
Did anybody remember to SCREW the steel plating back on?
When the Daedalus moves, its surrounding patrol ships are automatically brought back on board.
One of the great assets of the Magellan was that the stellar ark could mobilize its own flotilla. You debug the last packets of code from the Magnet automatic pilot program. That'll do the trick.
Increases your chances of successfully landing on a planet.

Thanks to these antigravity thrusters, taking off and landing in the Icarus become child's play. Entering the atmosphere becomes easier than falling off a log. In short, the Icarus is a hell of a machine to go flying in!
The coffee machine also regenerates automatically on Cycle 4.
Yeehaw!! By plugging a basic portable particle accelerator into the exhaust of the roaster pump, it is now possible to obtain a coffee in less than 12 hours!!
All attack damage sustained by the Daedalus is reduced by one point.
Eureka! In Magellan, the fibre optic cables which line the corridors can easily be compressed in order to add extra cabling. By adding even more cables, you can build a kind of pseudo-armor!
Now available in Alpha Bay 2. Lets you unwind a little at the expense of a few contusions. Winning restores your morale.
Dynarcade, this old war machine originally put together to train rookies can easily be converted into a video game.
Adds another drone to take care of the Daedalus in the Nexus.
Going through an old archive and examining data on Terrence's drones, it appears that it should be possible to ask NERON to build us another one.
Increases the firepower of all patrol ships by one point.
A 40mm cannon is good. A 80mm Blaster is better.
Takeoff and landing maneuvers are much more straightforward.
After running the numbers, federation engineers released a superb report on the correlation between the ease of takeoff and the size of the bay doors. Astonishing.
Generates 4 pieces of scrap metal and 4 of plastic scrap in Engine Room.
Is the enemy too tenacious? Trash'em up good!
Food from the garden is now sent directly to the refectory via a system of pneumatic piping.

Wow... You never really thought of it, but this tubing system has inspired you. In certain prehistoric societies, they used induced air tubes to send messages... However, these could just as easily be used to transport food! You convert the guttering into a pneumatic tube. (What would be the point of having guttering in space...)
The Icarus automatically returns to the Daedalus in the event of a full loss of the expedition crew.

Using NERON's source code, you realize that you can give the Icarus a kind of pseudo-awareness. You decide to get rid of the pseudo-cognitive code and the emotion engine but keep the survival kernel. Now if a planet expedition is a failure, the Icarus returns automatically.
Thanks to the stellar antenna, attempts to contact Sol will make twice as much progress.
What wouldn't you give to please the Comm... By increasing the CPU priority of the harbinger thread, you make their life a lot easier...
Improved in-flight and turret targeting by 25%.
NERON can also make life easier for you. A small patch in the instrument panel filling algorithm and voilà!
Displays the identity of crewmembers on the Tracker.
Displays a uniquely coloured pixel indicating who is on board on the tracker. Useful for tracking anyone's slightest movements.
In the garden, young shoots grow twice as quickly.
This piece of equipment, which was specially designed for seedlings, is able to saturate a plant's environment with nitrogen in order to accelerate their development without harming the adult plants.
Prevents coming back dirty from an expedition.
What a magnificent stainless steel sink! You now have no excuse for not washing your hands between missions.
The Icarus can carry 2 additional passengers.
By getting rid of the backup motor which still remains to be proven useful, we can squeeze in another 2 seats.
Takeoff maneuvers for Patrol Ships and Pasiphae cost 1 less :pa:.
While finalizing the implementation of new door servos, NERON realized what it had under the hood! That sped things up no end...
If a NERON project is over 0% complete, it automatically improves by 5% every cycle.
After a good telling off, NERON often becomes more productive, especially when it comes to working on itself. You install an alarm clock which insults its active memory automatically every hour.
By reversing the polarity of the Tesla turret modulator, it is possible to double their recharge rate!
The planet scanner reveals an additional section per Analysis.
The InfraSensors also have a dark matter probability detector and recorder which should noticeably increase their utility.
By adding a piston-based compression system, the storage capacity of the Teslatron reservoirs on the patrol ships can be doubled.
Increases maximum :pa: for all crewmembers by 2.
Is the infernal din from the engines stopping you from realizing your potential? There's a solution for that.
The SNC R&D has updated the ultimate productivity killer. And we've found their stash! Watch out for fallout. DRINKS!
Reduce injuries caused by actions by 50%.
Puts an end to the stellar coldness of the Daedalus' parquet flooring. From now on, you're in the warmth!
Every cycle, the Daedalus has a 20% chance of saving oxygen.
Algae growing in the air-conditioning ducts. Maybe we could encourage rampant growth of banana trees?
Makes a Jukebox Blueprint available in the Nexus. Lets you relax while listening to some good tunes...
Each cycle, the Jukebox plays a different song. Each character can gain 2 :pmo: when their favorite song plays.

Grempf molecules stimulate the production of androgenous hormones such as testosterone. This functions on humans and animals, regardless of sex, and even plants. You heard about the mysterious migration of sequoias in Yosemite park? Well there you go.
The maximum number of Mush spores generated per day is reduced by 2. Give 3 :triumph:

By injecting vanilla-flavoured components into the oxygen compressor at high pressure, it can be observed that this kills all the mushrooms in the ventilation shafts. Why not just diffuse it everywhere, help destroy our hated enemy and as a plus, the whole ship smells of vanilla.
All rations are infected with a serum which renders the extraction of spores much more difficult. Give 3 :triumph:

By isolating Mush aggregators, it can be seen that Brugien DNA, which was added to allow rapid spore production, has a major weakness which allows the metabolism of carriers to be slowed down. With a little help, the famous Atch Wum already managed to apply this process during the invasion of [...].
Allows the detection of spores on a healthy crew member. Give 3 :triumph:

Finola Keegan's article "From the spore to non-life" is a seminal work in the field of Mushology. It created a branch of science dealing with aggregation organisms. Aggregators, in effect, are strains of viruses which allow the partial splitting of DNA or RNA strands in the host and extract their genetic makeup in order to alter themselves or their genetic pool [...]. This article leads directly to the creation of a costly item: The Mycoscan.
Hunters have a 20% chance of firing on one of their own. Give 3 :triumph:

Gauss-Freon's theory. A powerful weapon against the incredible Mush synchronization, by working with Fourrier's harmonic resonance frequencies, you realize that this huge carcass can be transformed into a loudspeaker and cause patulic trauma in the fragile brain of the Hunter. Traumatized by the repeated bursts of this horrific sound, they appear to be disconcerted [...].

Some of the melanine secreted by Chun seems to be used by her liver to secrete a completely unique bacteria which has been named ZC16H. It seems that this bacteria reacts violently when placed in contact with a Mush sample. It literally digests the fungus and then reproduces at an alarming rate. We must learn what affects the treatment of the melanine, and this could be the key to creating a Mush antidote! The findings of this study could be critical and could make the whole team famous.
Every shower you take will destroy one mush spore on your body. Give 3 :triumph:

By watching the activity of spores inserted into Chun's body, it appeared that the disintegration accelerated when in contact with the subject's adipose tissue. With a classical liposuction operation it should be possible to create a powerful anti-fungal soap. Now we just have to convince Chun.

An excellent thesis on the crystalline structure of the communication pheremones of Mush. Light reading, but essential for the understanding of the parasite, it deals concisely with the problem of DNA harmonics and the linguistic expression thereof.
Humans can survive up to 3 mush spores before turning into Mush. Give 3 :triumph:

We have discovered an anomaly in Chun's pancreatic function. It seems to be producing bacteria capable of devouring mush spores. Unfortunately, the bacteria functions too slowly to hold back the plague. However, it can slow its propagation considerably.

Following the autopsy of a species of axolotl known as the "The Oracle of Wupperthal", certain similarities were found between one species of this vertebrate and the secretion of bacillus 764. It was shown that Mush and its non-saprophyte components led them to create a chain of Procaryotic fungi which mutated more quickly. This allowed us to see that the Mush strain that we know possesses several sub-chains which are detailed in this interesting article.

A fascinating study linking chanterelle parthenogenesis in an anaerobic environment with the possibility of reproducing the Mush parasite. The findings of this report will catapult its writers to scientific stardom.

Toxins, spores, the smell, there are so many factors which expose the Mush, that you throw yourself into collecting all the known qualities of Mush to build the ultimate alarm. Based on the oscillation coefficient of the Alpha pheromone and the rate of toxin emission, it is theoretically possible to create a miniature alarm which will go off automatically if a Mush agent spikes someone with a spore within a monitored zone.
The Distiller can be used once a day to create a drug.

Minor energy surges from the PILGRED reactor (also called RoToTo) can be captured in MZ16 batteries injected into a high-yield synthesizer in order to create complex compounds like paracetamule or ibuprophet. With this piece of kit, there's nothing to fear from space flu!

While dissecting crocodiles with lateral sphincter dysplasia, professor DipNui brought to the fore qualities of the digestive tract of the animal. You don't remember why anymore, but this led you to try out a little experiment with your blaster. It appeared that the reduction caused by the Bacillus anthracitus toxin had a devastating effect and turned Mush DNA into "Zombi" DNA, which caused frightening degradations in [...]

Who would have thought that cats hid such secrets... When working on cornea ionisation issues during interplanetary travel, you think of injecting an auto-gamma enhancer to enhance your crewmates' vision.
The infected can no longer communicate on the mush channel. Give 3 :triumph:

Sometimes, experiments carried out under the influence of LSD around the year 2070 led to superb articles on para-psychological experiments. Careful inspection of the last report of Professer Delopine in 2069 discussing the relationship between certain species of sheep and grasses which naturally produce this drug, you will realize that it is possible to synthesize buds of patulos which are reknowned for their anti-fungal properties.

Thanks to a series of rigorous tests, we have finally worked out how to use the rain stick! It is simply necessary to insert it into a nostril. The regular circulation of air allows a passive oxidation reaction to occur, bringing about a weak, but regular seepage. This guarantees to provide the entire water requirements of a human body for over 3200 years.
The Tracker now allows the user to communicate on the mush channel. Give 3 :triumph:

Of all the objects created in Finola's laboratory, this one remains unfinished. By collecting all the genome data and combining it with some old research, you discover the secret of Mush communication. This is a powerful tool: by adding a pheromodem to the trackers, everyone will soon be able to throw away their antiquated walky-talky!

An excellent study into Gershwin's correlation between fungal infection and propagation mechanics linked to quasar inflection. Once this correlation was confirmed, the idea of using a particle accelerator to synthesize a powerful retro-fungal substrate rapidly became THE solution to the Mush invasion. This study's findings are vital and will make the whole team famous.
Despite its unnerving design, you keep the faith. You know that at the price of minor skin lesions, this bad boy will get rid of the purulent fungal strands.
Generates a piece of equipment on the Nexus which allows data to be extracted from cristallites.

Neron is clearly a clever individual but calculations are not its strong suit... By analysing the molecular structure of cristallite, you think you'll be able to knock something together which will be able to extract the data contained within.
Increases the maximum payload of the Daedalus' turrets by 2.
By plunging a swizzle stick into a tesla vessel during fusion we have succeeded in doubling its fissile content production. It is now possible for us to store 50% more energy in our turrets!
Healing actions regenerate an additional health point.
Thanks to a few basic skills in organic chemistry you reckon you can put together a basic medikit which is much superior to the antiquated models used by the SDF.
